channel.title: LAN Party on Cache Valley Communities
channel.description: Recent content in LAN Party on Cache Valley Communities

item.title: Cache Tech Community Meetup/LAN Party - December 2025
item.description: Join us on December 13th, 2025, at 1:00 PM (MST) at Bridgerland Technical College for a LAN Party. Bring your favorite games - whether it’s Steam titles, retro classics, consoles, board games, or your PC! Get ready for an afternoon of gaming and community connection. We’ll provide pizza to keep you fueled while you play, and socialize with fellow tech enthusiasts. Whether you’re here to game intensely or simply chat and unwind, this is the perfect way to celebrate the year with our community.
